name: Republicans vs. Democrats Race to 2018
description:
With a tumultuous administration, Republicans and Democrats in Congress have another battle to fight: How will their respective parties win the midterm 2018 elections? Republicans are the current majority in Congress, but are dealing with a Republican administration that many Americans disapprove of—and some voters want immediate change. On the other hand, Democrats could play off the weaknesses of the Republican party—but will the party take initiative and win over moderates and Trump-opposing Republicans? In this game, Republicans and Democrats will embark on a race against each other—and time—down the National Mall to try and win the midterms in 2018—but not without facing obstacles including tensions with North Korea, tax reform, energy and environment, immigration and more.

Good luck and Godspeed,
Alex Whitten and Sydney Greene
Game Developers
